content:
Message Mapping

  • Message conventions are difficult

  • Tools should be independent

    • Separate message accepted and sent

  • Message mapping works well

    • Each tool defines its own I/O messages
    • File specifies input->output mappings
    • Forest/Mediators/FIELD Policy
    • Desert MSGMAP tool heavily used

  • Outside or inside message server
